Articles.Content:
Hey just thought I would make a topic where you can share your cool explosion screenshots ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

So add them now!!

Here is a few of mine:

> ![7311683468_f7179c291f_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7099/7311683468_f7179c291f_b.jpg)
> ![7311686130_872d09cbfe_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7099/7311686130_872d09cbfe_b.jpg)
> 
> ![7311680254_a81b89b62e_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7088/7311680254_a81b89b62e_b.jpg)

Rules:

[list type=decimal]

[li]Must include a explosion or something that went wrong[/li]

[li]Must be put in a Spoiler[/li]

[li] 8)[/li]

> 
> > ![screenshot248.png](http://i905.photobucket.com/albums/ac251/PowerFusionX/screenshot248.png)
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  8)

Wow! That is a great picture!

> 
> Wow! That is a great picture!

More importantly, did they survive?

> 
> More importantly, did they survive?

I sure hope so lol. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Actually, they did surprisingly. I flipped it and managed to slow down by smashing that fuel tank into the ground. Then when my pod bounced back up I turned it to resemble a wheel and spun it. When it hit the surface it just started rolling.

total epic moment there.

I had just had my first landing on the Mun in .15, and after a particularly rough landing, my ascent stage was on its side. I used RCS and landing legs to right myself.

> ![T8Ili.png](http://i.imgur.com/T8Ili.png)

 I immediately tried to puddle jump to the giant rock arch nearby. Of course, MechJeb landed me on a steep slope. Hilarity ensued.

> ![Nt76l.png](http://i.imgur.com/Nt76l.png)![IxckO.png](http://i.imgur.com/IxckO.png)

So maybe using, uhh, 12 retro-solids to brake when spinning out of control is a bad idea. At least the crew survived. 

> ![SsNVi.png](http://i.imgur.com/SsNVi.png)

I guess it\'s time I showed my fireworks again =P

> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_aHoP-E1wYA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

This was from 0.14, so I\'ll remake this in 0.16 to try out the new explosions!

Oh, and sorry, but this is a video, not screenshots...

I am not sure how the jet engines ended up above the explosion, but there you go.

> ![screenshot90q.png](http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/1743/screenshot90q.png)
> ![screenshot89w.png](http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/4875/screenshot89w.png)

Lucky Jeb wasn't on this mission, seems his seat exploded first.

**Edited <time datetime="2012-08-30T13:51:14Z" title="08/30/2012 01:51  PM" data-short="11 yr">August 30, 2012</time> by Rich**
